form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, Form I-130

full_text: Form approved. Budget Bareau No. 43-R401.4. PETITION TO Date filed Fee stamp CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR RECD T/C APR 14 1969 ISSUANCE OF IMMI- GRANT VISA (Read this form and the attached instructions carefully before filling in petition) To THE SECRETARY OF STATE: The petition was filed on April 14,1969 The petition is revalidated: The petition is approved for status under section 201(b) Remarks: DATE Oct. 11,1969 DATE OF OF DD ACTION 8.9. ACTION DD DISTRICT Habrict Director DISTRICT NEW York (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. Block I.-Information About Petitioner MERYL ALPERT 2. Name (First name) (Middle name) (Last name) MERYL WOLFSON If you are a married woman, give your maiden name 83-43 118th Street Kew Gardens, New York 11415 3. I reside in the United States at (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code) Address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (City or town) (Province) (Country) December 8, 1934 Toronto Canada 4. I was born (Date) (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) 5. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Was your citizenship acquired through birth in the United States, through naturalization, through parentage, or through marriage? (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate and date and place w of naturalization: (2) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name based on such acquisition? (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: AA-258055, issued December 26, 1967, New York City (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with Instruction 3a(2). b. Have you or any person through whom you claim citizenship ever lost United States citizenship? If so, attach detailed explanation po separate=shee 6. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the UGred State give the following: Oz a. Alien Registration Number: A- b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful primanent residence C. Have you ever lost status as a lawful permanent Cocdent alien? If so, explain: (If you are married to a citizen of the United States, read instruction 1b carefully) Form I-130 (Rev. 5-27-68) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE-Immigration and Naturalization Service
